posts.post_title: FS: Nichols AB 350 No Frame SOLD
posts.post_content:
This Simon Nichols 350 Only Subject is quite a tough common.  The card has some light creasing and edge chipping. Very nice clean back. Shipping included.  PP payment owed or gift please.  Thank you very much for looking and have a great day!

(Sorry for card displayed horizontally, couldn't get it to show vertically)

$old

Best,

Andy
